info.description: LeadDesk offers cloud service for high-volume sales and customer-service. LeadDesk helps contact center agents close more by connecting the right person, with the right offer, through the right channel at the right time. Connect to LeadDesk and perform various actions to manage your leads, contacts and agents.
info.title: LeadDesk

get.description: This operation edits an agent's campaign access rights.

parameters.description: Add or remove the agent from the campaign
parameters.name: type

post.description: This operation creates a new agent.
This operation creates a new public or private callback.

contactid.description: If set, other given contact values will be ignored
contactid.title: Contact ID

get.description: This operation creates a new contact in a calling list.
This operation finds an agent's name and ID based on their username.

post.description: This operation gets a list of contact IDs fitting the given information.
This operation edits an agent's personal and work related information.

get.description: This operation edits a contact's information.

parameters.description: Calling list's LeadDesk ID or name
parameters.name: list
